HA.userControl.RockerSwitch: Your hearing aids feature a rocker switch user control
HA.userControl.PushButton: Your hearing aids feature a push button user control
HA.userControl.None: Your hearing aids do not feature on-board user controls

HA.supportsHandsfreeCallsiOS.False: Your hearing aid does not support Handsfree Calls for iOS

HA.supportsTelecoil.False: Your hearing aid does not contain a telecoil

HA.supportsMFI.False: Your hearing aid does not support MFI Streaming for Apple phones

HA.batterySize.R L: Your hearing aid has a large size rechargeble battery

HA.TinnitusFeatures.NoiserOnly: Your hearing aid supports Tinnitus relief sounds

HA.supportsStreamlineAccessories.False: Your hearing aid does not support streaming with Streamline TV and Streamline Mic accessories

App.PairingType.QR Code Pairing:
You have not paired your hearing aids with the App using Blueooth. 
As a result your Signia app is missing some features like Directional Hearing, Split Volume Control, Digital Assistant, Mask Mode or WellBeing or is not showing the hearing program fitted by your hearing care professional. Also battery status is not availble as precise as when connecting with Bluetooth.
Please consider pairing again with Bluetooth.
App.PairingType.Manual Pairing:
You have not paired your hearing aids with the App using Blueooth. 
As a result your Signia app is missing some features like Directional Hearing, Split Volume Control, Digital Assistant, Mask Mode or WellBeing or is not showing the hearing program fitted by your hearing care professional. Also battery status is not availble as precise as when connecting with Bluetooth.
Please consider pairing again with Bluetooth.
App.PairingType.Bluetooth-Telecare: You have paired your hearing aids with the App using Bluetooth and have installed Telecare. In some cases it might be necessary to repair
App.PairingType.Bluetooth Pairing: You have paired your hearing aids with the App using Bluetooth. In some cases it might be necessary to repair

Phone.supportsASHA.asha grey list: Your phone supports ASHA streaming, but performance may vary
Phone.supportsASHA.asha unknown: Your phone might support ASHA streaming

Phone.OS.iOS: You have an iOS phone which supports MFI streaming
